name: starter-gym-fitness
description: Next.js 14 gym and fitness starter with class schedule, membership plans, trainer profiles, and testimonials. Dark theme with orange accents. TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router.
postMessage:
Iron Peak Fitness starter installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npm run dev

Customize your gym by editing lib/data.ts (classes, trainers, plans, schedule) and replace placeholder SVGs with real images.
